content: During the grace period, admins cannot create new rooms and add new users. After the due date of the grace period, {{productName}} will become unavailable until the payment is made.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining that during a grace period, admins can't create new rooms or add users, and that access will be unavailable until payment is made. It appears in a modal dialog and an invite quota warning dialog, prompting admins to make timely payments.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '(فترة السماح المؤقتة)' is repeated, creating redundancy. It's unnecessary to repeat 'temporary grace period'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: خلال فترة السماح، لا يُسمح للمسؤولين بإنشاء غرف جديدة أو إضافة مستخدمين جدد. بعد انتهاء تاريخ استحقاق فترة السماح، سيتم جعل {{productName}} غير متوفر حتى يتم سداد الدفعة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'سيتم جعل' (will be made) is slightly awkward in Arabic. A more natural phrasing could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: بعد انتهاء تاريخ استحقاق فترة السماح، {{productName}} لن يكون متاحاً حتى يتم سداد الدفعة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Güzəşt müddəti bitdikdən sonra" is a literal translation of "After the due date of the grace period." A more natural and idiomatic translation would be something like "Güzəşt müddəti sona çatdıqdan sonra" or "Güzəşt dövrü bitdikdən sonra".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Güzəşt dövrü bitdikdən sonra

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "bezahlten Frist" is an awkward and not entirely accurate translation of "grace period". "Grace period" implies a period of leeway, which "bezahlten Frist" emphasizes payment. A more natural translation would incorporate this nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Während der Gnadenfrist können Administratoren keine neuen Räume erstellen und keine neuen Benutzer hinzufügen. Nach dem Fälligkeitsdatum der Gnadenfrist wird {{productName}} nicht mehr verfügbar sein, bis die Zahlung erfolgt ist.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Frist' is repeated several times. While technically correct, this repetition can sound clunky in German. While not a strict error, a more fluent rendering is desirable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Während der Gnadenfrist können Administratoren keine neuen Räume erstellen und keine neuen Benutzer hinzufügen. Nach Ablauf der Gnadenfrist wird {{productName}} nicht mehr verfügbar sein, bis die Zahlung erfolgt ist.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "{{productName}}-a" is grammatically incorrect and doesn't accurately translate "{{productName}}". It appears to be attempting to incorporate the product name as a genitive form, which isn't necessary or correct in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "{{productName}}-a" with "{{productName}}".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically passable, the phrasing 'ei voi enää käyttää' could be improved for more natural flow. The word 'enää' (anymore) isn't strictly needed and makes the sentence slightly less concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ei voi enää käyttää' with 'ei voi käyttää'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon after "Արտոնյալ ժամանակահատվածում". This is not standard Armenian punctuation in this context and should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after "Արտոնյալ ժամանակահատվածում".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Արտոնյալ ժամանակաշրջանի վերջնաժամկետից հետո" is grammatically correct, but stylistically could be improved for flow. Consider rephrasing for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "Արտոնյալ ժամանակաշրջանի ավարտից հետո" or "Արտոնյալ ժամանակաշրջանը ավարտվելուց հետո".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '{{productName}} will become unavailable' is translated as '{{productName}}를 사용할 수 없습니다'. While technically correct, a more natural and precise translation would emphasize that the product is inaccessible or blocked. A better option would be '{{productName}} 이용이 중단됩니다' ({{productName}} usage is suspended).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 유예 기간이 지나면 결제할 때까지 {{productName}} 이용이 중단됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'grace period' is translated as 'prolongata'. While 'prolongata' can sometimes imply an extension, it doesn't accurately convey the meaning of a 'grace period' in this context, which refers to a short period after a due date before penalties are applied. A more accurate translation might be 'okres karencji' or 'okres przejściowy'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'okres karencji' or 'okres przejściowy' to better reflect the meaning of 'grace period'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'grace period' is translated as 'período de tolerância'. While technically correct, 'período de carência' might be a more natural and commonly understood translation in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'período de carência' instead of 'período de tolerância'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses '{{productName}}' for the variable. The Portuguese translation uses the same format, which is correct and consistent. No change needed.

The term 'grace period' is translated as 'período de carência'. While technically correct, 'período de cortesia' is a more common and natural translation in this context, specifically referring to a payment grace period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'grace period' as 'período de cortesia'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ajuta utilizatorii noi" (help new users) is not an accurate translation of "add new users." It introduces an action that isn't present in the English original. The English phrase implies adding users to the system or account.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: În perioada de graţie, administratorii nu pot crea sălile noi şi adăuga utilizatori noi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation maintains the English formatting with {{productName}}. It is important to ensure this placeholder is properly handled in the Romanian context, including proper localization if necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure {{productName}} is correctly localized or replaced with the appropriate Romanian product name.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'සහන කාල සීමාවේ අවසාන දිනය පසු වූ විට' is a bit convoluted. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සහන කාලය අවසන් වූ පසු

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '{{productName}}' seems consistent with the English. It's crucial that this variable is correctly handled in the Sinhala implementation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the variable '{{productName}}' is properly localized and displayed.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "grace period" is translated as "prehodnem obdobju," which is accurate but could be more natural. A more idiomatic translation might be "prehodno obdobje" (without the "m").
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V prehodnem obdobje skrbniki ne morejo ustvarjati novih sob in dodajati novih uporabnikov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'просторије' (prostorije) is used for 'rooms'. While technically correct, 'собе' (sobe) would be a more natural and common translation for 'rooms' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Током грејс периода, администратори не могу да праве нове собе и додају нове кориснике.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'grejs' is an Anglicism. The correct Serbian word for 'grace' is 'probni'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tokom probnog perioda, administratori ne mogu da prave nove prostorije i dodaju nove korisnike. Nakon isteka probnog perioda, {{productName}} će postati nedostupan dok se ne izvrši uplata.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ne mogu da prave' is less natural than 'ne mogu da kreiraju'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tokom probnog perioda, administratori ne mogu da kreiraju nove prostorije i dodaju nove korisnike. Nakon isteka probnog perioda, {{productName}} će postati nedostupan dok se ne izvrši uplata.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "grace period" is consistently translated as "ödemesiz dönem" which literally means 'payment-free period'. A more accurate and natural translation would be "erteleme süresi" (postponement period) or "uzatma süresi" (extension period) as it refers to a period where payments are delayed, not completely absent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating "grace period" as "erteleme süresi" or "uzatma süresi" for better clarity and naturalness.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Ödemesiz dönemin bitiş tarihinden sonra, ödeme yapılana kadar {{productName}} kullanılamayacaktır." is a bit verbose and less fluent than it could be. A more concise and natural translation of 'After the due date of the grace period, {{productName}} will become unavailable until the payment is made.' would be '{{productName}}, ödeme yapılana kadar, erteleme süresinin bitiş tarihinden sonra kullanılamayacaktır.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase the sentence to: '{{productName}}, ödeme yapılana kadar, erteleme süresinin bitiş tarihinden sonra kullanılamayacaktır.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ngày hết hạn thanh toán" (payment due date) is a bit literal and less natural in Vietnamese. A more common and clearer phrasing would be 'hết thời gian ân hạn' or 'kết thúc thời gian ân hạn'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sau khi hết thời gian ân hạn, {{productName}} sẽ không khả dụng cho đến khi thanh toán được thực hiện.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the punctuation in Vietnamese often places a space before certain punctuation marks (e.g., before a period or question mark).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trong thời gian ân hạn, quản trị viên không thể tạo phòng mới và thêm người dùng mới . Sau khi hết thời gian ân hạn, {{productName}} sẽ không khả dụng cho đến khi thanh toán được thực hiện.
